live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. We expect services to be restored by 3:30 MT. Please stay tuned for updates.
37488.summary: Some customers in the Crescent Heights area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
37488.title: May 19 – Calgary (Crescent Heights) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
